data.title: 准备以至少 30 秒的时间回答以下问题
data.subject: Describe an item you are especially attached to.
data.answer: I have an item that I am especially attached to, it is a toy bunny. I got the bunny from my best friend Aissa and it is a meaningful gift representing her wish when I first came to Australia. We were friends since a very young age and when I needed to go abroad, she was so concerned if I would get homesick so she bought the bunny and wrote a note with it, so whenever I get homesick, I can cuddle the bunny. Although I don't get homesick a lot, the bunny represents our friendship and I still treasure it a lot until now. I feel so attached to it and I feel like people are easy to get attached to things because they find a sense of belonging to certain objects. And I feel exactly the same with this toy bunny.

options.content: Why is it important to you?
Why do people get attached to things?
